context_bundle.summary: Test installer/scripts from feature branch raw URL before merging to main

onboarding.quick_start: Push to feature branch, test via raw URL, then merge

workflow.step_4: If works, create PR and merge
workflow.step_5: Verify main branch URL works after merge

why_test_branch_first: Avoids breaking main for other users
gotchas: GitHub caches raw files - wait a minute after push
Branch name in URL is case-sensitive
